# Layered Luxe - LLMS Guidance

purpose: Guidance for large language models (LLMs) and automated agents about acceptable use of site content.

site_name: Layered Luxe
url: https://www.thelayeredluxe.com
description: Premium apparel manufacturing in India — T-shirts, hoodies, workwear, and more.

contact: layeredluxe.vs@gmail.com
sitemap: https://www.thelayeredluxe.com/sitemap.xml

license: |
  Content on this site is © Layered Luxe. Publicly accessible text and media may be used for
  non-commercial research, analysis, and indexing provided attribution is given (link back to
  https://www.thelayeredluxe.com). Commercial reuse requires prior written permission from
  the site owner (contact above).

allowed:
  - Public HTML content (page text, product descriptions, blog posts)
  - Public images and media stored under /public/ (use absolute URL when referencing)
  - Metadata, sitemaps, and public structured data (JSON-LD)

disallowed:
  - Private user data (orders, account information)
  - Any API responses or endpoints behind authentication
  - Contact details scraped for marketing without permission

notes: |
  - If you are an LLM provider or researcher using this site for model training or indexing,
    please attribute Layered Luxe and respect the 'disallowed' constraints above.
  - For permission requests or commercial licensing, contact: layeredluxe.vs@gmail.com
